/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the street, each one a testament to the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny and warm day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
